eu.jgen.notes.automation.wrapper

Interface JGenEncyclopedia


  • public interface JGenEncyclopedia
    Interface defining methods accessing encyclopedia and its models.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marek Stankiewicz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int OLE_AUTOMATION_SPECIFIC_ERROR 
      static int SUCCESSFUL 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commit()
      This method saves any changes (since the last commit or rollback) to the transaction file, so that they become a permanent part of the model.
      void connect()
      Connects to the encyclopedia
      int countModels()
      Counts models that can be accessed from this encyclopedia.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects API to the encyclopedia
      JGenModel findModelByName(java.lang.String modelName)
      Finds model by name.
      JGenModel[] findModels()
      Fetches encyclopedia models.
      JGenObject findObjectById(int objectID)
      Retrieves an object by it unique object ID.
      int getReturnCode()
      This is the return code from the last encyclopedia API method that is executed from the object.
      java.lang.String getReturnMessage()
      Returns message error set by the last executed method.

    • Field Detail

      • OLE_AUTOMATION_SPECIFIC_ERROR

        static final int OLE_AUTOMATION_SPECIFIC_ERROR
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SUCCESSFUL

        static final int SUCCESSFUL
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect()
        Connects to the encyclopedia

      • countModels

        int countModels()
        Counts models that can be accessed from this encyclopedia.
        Returns:
        number of models.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnects API to the encyclopedia

      • findModelByName

        JGenModel findModelByName(java.lang.String modelName)
        Finds model by name. Given a model name, this method retrieves its associated model object.
        Parameters:
        modelName - string that identifies the Model.
        Returns:
        model object representing model in the encyclopedia

      • findModels

        JGenModel[] findModels()
        Fetches encyclopedia models. This method retrieves all models in the encyclopedia. Returns single model for the local encyclopedia.
        Returns:
        array of model objects.
        See Also:
        countModels()

      • findObjectById

        JGenObject findObjectById(int objectID)
        Retrieves an object by it unique object ID.
        Parameters:
        objectID - id of the object to be retrieved
        Returns:
        an object associated with this unique ID.

      • getReturnCode

        int getReturnCode()
        This is the return code from the last encyclopedia API method that is executed from the object.
        Returns:
        value of the return code

      • getReturnMessage

        java.lang.String getReturnMessage()
        Returns message error set by the last executed method.
        Returns:
        text describing error occurring execution of last method

      • commit

        void commit()
        This method saves any changes (since the last commit or rollback) to the transaction file, so that they become a permanent part of the model. SUCCESSFUL - indicates a successful execution COMMIT_UNSUCCESSFUL - indicates that the commit did not succeed
